products.name: Swiss Gear Zernez 3-Piece Soft Side 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Black
products.shortDescription: This Swiss Gear 3-piece soft-side luggage set gives you the perfect travel companion for all occasions. From the Zernez collection, each piece features four 360-degree spinning wheels to move in all directions while the lightweight construction gives you better mobility. The expansion option for the 24" and 28" pieces allow for extra packing capacity.

products.name: it luggage Galactic 3-Piece Hard Side 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Silver
products.shortDescription: Traveling across the galaxy or around the world is easy with the 3-piece Galactic luggage set by IT Luggage. It includes a 30", 26", and 21" case. Each case features 360-degree spinner wheels for easy manoeuvering, expandable packing room for last-minute souvenirs, and separate zippered compartments with tie-down straps to keep your stuff secure.

products.name: Swiss Gear Zernez 3-Piece Soft Side 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Red
products.shortDescription: This Swiss Gear 3-piece soft-side luggage set gives you the perfect travel companion for all occasions. From the Zernez collection, each piece features four 360-degree spinning wheels to move in all directions while the lightweight construction gives you better mobility. The expansion option for the 24" and 28" pieces allow for extra packing capacity.

products.name: Swiss Gear Zernez 3-Piece Soft Side 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Teal
products.shortDescription: This Swiss Gear 3-piece soft-side luggage set gives you the perfect travel companion for all occasions. From the Zernez collection, each piece features four 360-degree spinning wheels to move in all directions while the lightweight construction gives you better mobility. The expansion option for the 24" and 28" pieces allow for extra packing capacity.

products.name: Swiss Gear Peregrinate 3-Piece Hard Side Expandable Luggage Set - Silver
products.shortDescription: You want to be able to access your suitcase but you don't want others to have that luxury. With this lightweight 3-piece spinner suitcase set from Swiss Gear you'll have peace of mind knowing that each piece has a main compartment slider, which can be locked to keep your things safe.

products.name: Heys Endurance 2-Piece 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Red
products.shortDescription: Traveling can be stressful. But when you've got luggage you can depend on, like this Heys Endurance 2-piece luggage, you'll find that some things take care of themselves. With an array of convenient packing and manoeuvrability features, this lightweight luggage is made from polycarbonate composite with a contoured, diamond-embossed design for impressive durability.

products.name: Seiko 41mm Men's Two-Tone Analog Dress Watch - Gold/Silver/Blue
products.shortDescription: Add a touch of style to any outfit with this Seiko men's dress watch. Its elegant gold-plated case and deep blue dial dress up any ensemble. This analog watch uses quartz movement for accurate timekeeping and has a date window to keep you on schedule. It's also water resistant up to 100m, letting you wear it in the shower or while surface swimming.

products.name: Samsonite Stamina NXT 3-Piece Hard Side 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Metallic Green
products.shortDescription: Whether visiting family or adventuring in new territory, you'll appreciate the convenience and style of the Samsonite Stamina NXT 3-piece luggage set. All pieces are equipped with 4 spinner wheels that provide 360-degree upright rolling in multiple directions so you can navigate easily and smoothly. They come equipped with TSA combination locks.

products.name: Swiss Gear Peregrinate 3-Piece Hard Side Expandable Luggage Set - Blue
products.shortDescription: Whether planning an overnight business trip or a month in Hawaii, be prepared for any adventure with this exceptional 3-piece luggage set from Swiss Gear. This sleek, matching hard side luggage set is made from ABS material for lightweight durability. Multi-directional wheels and extendable handles make airport mobility a breeze.

products.name: Seiko 41mm Men's Two-Tone Analog Dress Watch - Gold/Silver/Grey
products.shortDescription: Add a touch of style to any outfit with this Seiko men's dress watch. Its elegant gold-plated case dresses up any ensemble. It's also water resistant up to 100m, letting you wear it in the shower or while surface swimming.

products.name: Heys Endurance 2-Piece 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Teal

products.name: Samsonite Stamina NXT 3-Piece Hard Side 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Metallic Grey
products.shortDescription: Whether planning an overnight business trip or a month in Paris, be prepared for any adventure with this exceptional 3-piece luggage set from Samsonite. This sleek, matching hard side luggage set is made from polycarbonate material for lightweight durability. And TSA-approved lock integration lets you check your luggage with peace of mind.

products.name: Heys Outlander 2-Piece 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Pewter
products.shortDescription: Traveling can be stressful. But when you've got luggage you can depend on, like this Heys Outlander 2-piece luggage, you'll find that some things take care of themselves. With an array of convenient packing and manoeuvrability features, this lightweight luggage is made from polycarbonate composite with a contoured, diamond-embossed design for impressive durability.

products.name: Delsey Seascape 3-Piece Hard Side 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Blue
products.shortDescription: When convenience and peace of mind are your priorities, this luggage set from Delsey has thoughtfully designed features that you'll love. These sleek and lightweight hard side spinners each have 4 EZ Glide spinner wheels and a locking handle for seamless manoeuverability through hotels and airports. And they've got TSA-approved combination locks to put your mind at ease.

products.name: it luggage Whitehorse 3-Piece Hard Side 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Charcoal
products.shortDescription: The Whitehorse 3-piece trolley case set by IT luggage is rugged and resourceful like its namesake. This set includes a 30", 27", and 21.5" suitcase. Each case features four 360-degree spinner wheels for easy manoeuvering, expandable packing room for last-minute souvenirs, and a fully lined interior with tie-down straps to keep your stuff secure.

products.name: Heys Endurance 2-Piece 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Silver
products.shortDescription: Traveling can be stressful. But when you've got luggage you can depend on, like this Heys Endurance 2-piece luggage, you'll find that some things take care of themselves. With an array of convenient packing and manoeuvrability features, this lightweight luggage is made from polycarbonate composite with a contoured, diamond-embossed design for impressive durability.

products.name: CASIO STB-1000 53mm Digital Watch with Bluetooth - Black/Grey
products.shortDescription: Check fitness application information, control your music player and don't miss a single call or message with the Casio STB-1000 sport watch. This watch combines modern technology and traditional functionality in one stylish timepiece. It features daily alarms, a countdown timer, Bluetooth 4.0, a lap counter and is water resistant to 100 metres.

products.name: Samsonite Expression LTD 2-Piece Hard Side 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Red
products.shortDescription: Whether you're taking a weekend jaunt to the local ski resort or travelling across the world, you'll love the Samsonite Expression LTD 2-piece luggage set. Both pieces are equipped with 4 spinner wheels that provide 360-degree upright rolling in multiple directions so you can navigate easily and smoothly.

products.name: High Sierra Tech 2 55L Outdoor Frame Backpack - Moss/Mercury/Chartreuse
products.shortDescription: Built for big adventure, this 55L High Sierra Tech 2 Frame outdoor backpack is the perfect companion for anyone with a touch of good old fashioned wanderlust. It has loads of zippered compartments to organize your essentials and snag souvenirs while your travel, and is fully adjustable to ensure a fine-tuned, comfy fit.

products.name: Targus Groove X Series 15" Laptop Backpack - Black
products.shortDescription: Carry your 15" MacBook Pro in style and safety with the Targus Groove X Series backpack. It features SafePORT sling protection that suspends your MacBook safeguarding it against impact and shock. The bottom of the backpack is made from a wear- and water-resistant material that offers long-lasting use. It has cushioned top and side carry handles.

products.name: Swiss Gear Salzburg 2-Piece Hard Side 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Charcoal
products.shortDescription: Navigate airports, bus terminals, and urban streets with ease. The Swiss Gear Salzburg luggage has 4 spinning wheels, and a retractable, locking handle to provide freedom of movement. The main compartment of each case has interior tie-down straps, a zippered pocket under the lid, and a slider which can be locked for added security.

products.name: Casio Sports Gear Men's Sport Watch (AQW-100-1AVCF) - Black Band
products.shortDescription: This Casio watch goes beyond what you think a watch can do. It's engineered with outdoor essential features like moon data, a tide graph, thermometer, and fish indicator. The Active Dial adds three-dimensional depth to the face while indicating the cardinal directions. It can also be used during fitness activities since it acts as a 24 hour countdown timer and 1/100 second stopwatch.

products.name: Austin House Universal Travel Adapter (AH13UA01-095) - White
products.shortDescription: Charge your portable devices in more than 160 countries with the Austin House universal adapter with USB. This adapter works in most regions of Africa, Asia, Europe, Middle East, New Zealand, North America, and Russia. A mechanical safety shutter also reduces the risk of electrical shock.

products.name: Swiss Gear Gallivant 28" Hard Side 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage - Silver
products.shortDescription: Fly to new, exciting destinations with this 28" hard side luggage piece from Swiss Gear. Part of the Gallivant collection, this suitcase comes equipped with 4 multidirectional spinner wheels and a retractable handle to provide smooth and effortless manoeuvrability. Equipped with an expandable case, this suitcase delivers extra packing space if needed.

products.name: Heys Outlander 2-Piece 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Purple
products.shortDescription: Traveling can be stressful. But when you've got luggage you can depend on, like this Heys Outlander 2-piece luggage, you'll find that some things take care of themselves. With an array of convenient packing and manoeuvrability features, this lightweight luggage is made from polycarbonate composite with a contoured, diamond-embossed design for impressive durability.

products.name: Apple World Travel Adapter Kit (MD837AM/A)
products.shortDescription: Perfect for world travellers, the Apple World Travel Adapter Kit ensures your Apple devices never run out of power. This set comes with 7 AC plugs with pins that fit different power points in North America, Japan, China, United Kingdom, continental Europe, Korea, Australia, Hong Kong, and Brazil.

products.name: Kenneth Cole Speckled Way 3-Piece 8-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Charcoal
products.shortDescription: There are enough things to worry about when you're travelling. Luggage shouldn't be one of them. Thankfully, this Kenneth Cole 3-piece luggage set has you covered. It comes with a 20" carry-on, 25" upright suitcase, and 29" upright suitcase, each one featuring an expandable design, 8-wheel 360-degree spinners, and a fully-lined interior.

products.name: Samsonite Stamina NXT 3-Piece Hard Side 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Metallic Rose
products.shortDescription: Whether planning an overnight business trip or a month in Paris, be prepared for any adventure with this exceptional 3-piece luggage set from Samsonite. This sleek, matching hard side luggage set is made from polycarbonate material for lightweight durability. And TSA-approved lock integration lets you check your luggage with peace of mind.

products.name: Samsonite Tech Series 3-Piece 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Copper
products.shortDescription: The Samsonite 3-piece hard side luggage set offers the storage solution you need when travelling. Part of the sleek Tech Series, each suitcase comes equipped with 4 multidirectional spinner wheels so you can glide with ease to your next destination. Each suitcase also includes a mounted TSA lock to keep your valuables safe.

products.name: Swiss Gear Peregrinate 28" Hard Side 4-Wheeled Expandable Luggage - Silver
products.shortDescription: You want to be able to access your suitcase but you don't want others to have that luxury. With this lightweight 28" spinner suitcase from Swiss Gear you'll have peace of mind knowing that it has a main compartment slider which can be locked to keep your things safe.

products.name: Kenneth Cole Color Me Ridged 3-Piece Hard Side 8-Wheeled Expandable Luggage Set - Navy
products.shortDescription: Traveling in style doesn't mean you have to sacrifice function. This 3-piece Color Me Ridged collection luggage set by Kenneth Cole Reaction includes a 29", 25", and 20" case. Each case features eight 360-degree spinner wheels, expandable main compartment with two-sided packing, bottom grab handle, and interior pockets to help keep you organized.
